comments: Second column of A027446. - _Olivier Gérard_, Dec 11 1999Rows sums of (A002262*A096180).  - _Eric Desbiaux_, Apr 23 2013
formula: Numerators of sequence a[ 2, n ] in (a[ i, j ])^2 where a[ i, j ] = 1/i if j<=i, 0 if j>i. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 24 2006a(n) = (Psi(n+1)-1+gamma)*LCM(n), LCM(n) = lcm{1..n}. - _Peter Luschny_, Dec 01 2011
author: _Olivier Gérard_
extensions: New name, offset changed to 1, a(1) and a(21)-a(29) added. - _Peter Luschny_, Dec 01 2011
